sentence.Network_en: You'll go cross - eyed if you try to look at things so close to you.
sentence.Network_cn: 这么近看东西会变成对眼的.

sentence.Network_en: I can only say that I get cross - eyed at some of them.
sentence.Network_cn: 我能只说有些让我看得目瞪口呆.

sentence.Network_en: She is cross - eyed , which makes her feel inferior.
sentence.Network_cn: 由于她是斗眼, 总感觉到自卑.

entry.tran: 内斜视的;对眼的;斗鸡眼的
entry.def: Someone who is cross-eyed has eyes that seem to look towards each other.
